title: S2 Ep5: Supporting learning out of school
itunes:title: Supporting learning out of school
description: In developing countries, more than 90% of children go to primary school. How can we best support their learning? An experiment in India targeted both the times the kids are in school, and the times they are not. Martina Björkman Nyqvist tells Tim Phillips what works -- and what doesn't.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
